list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a road, route, or line) separate from another route, especially a main one, and go in a different direction.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the flight path diverged from the original flight plan
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Con đường bay chuyển hướng từ kế hoạch bay ban đầu

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a series) increase indefinitely as more of its terms are added.
